tasks.title: Implemented automatic dashboard update system
tasks.description: Created agentStop hook that automatically regenerates dashboard HTML after memory changes. Added --update-only flag to open-dashboard.sh script. Created comprehensive documentation guide.
tasks.outcome: Dashboard now updates automatically after agent execution. Users no longer need to manually run update-dashboard.sh

tasks.title: Refactored Context tab to use clickable list items with modals
tasks.description: Transformed Context tab from static expandable cards to clickable list items that open modals, matching the UX pattern of Decisions/Tasks/Patterns tabs. Added 4 render functions for context item types.
tasks.outcome: Context tab now displays clickable items in list format with modal details, achieving UI consistency across all dashboard tabs

tasks.title: Implemented sub-tabs navigation for Context tab
tasks.description: Added 5 sub-tabs (Project, Current, Recent Decisions, Active Patterns, Open Tasks) within Context tab for better organization. Created render functions for project and current focus entries with modal support.
tasks.outcome: Reverted - User preferred card-based layout instead of sub-tabs navigation

tasks.title: Implemented card-based layout for Context tab
tasks.description: Replaced sub-tabs with 5 clickable cards (Project, Current, Recent Decisions, Active Patterns, Open Tasks) displayed simultaneously in responsive grid. Each card shows summary with badge counter and opens modal with full details on click.
tasks.outcome: Context tab now displays all categories as cards in grid layout, providing better overview and direct access to each category via modal

_comments.dateFormat: Use ISO 8601 format with timezone for timestamps: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS-05:00
_comments.note: Dashboard will display date and time when timestamp includes 'T', otherwise only date
